data.text:
Published 1:20 am Friday, August 2, 2024

The Hawaii Rainbow Warriors rank ninth in the MWC, with +5000 odds to win the conference title in 2024. See the article below for more info on the team’s futures championship odds.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on Hawaii Rainbow Warriors’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

Hawaii Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: +5000 (Bet $10 to win $500.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 5.5 (Bet $12.00 to win $10 on the over with -120 odds)

Bet on Hawaii Rainbow Warriors futures odds & games on BetMGM.

Hawaii 2024 Schedule

According to its opponents’ combined win total last season (55), Hawaii has the benefit of the easiest schedule in college football. The Rainbow Warriors’ schedule features five games against teams that finished over .500 in 2023, which includes one versus a team with nine or more wins and two against squads that tallied fewer than four wins.

Watch Hawaii Rainbow Warriors games all season long on Fubo!
